animeDescription: After defeating Geese Howard, legendary fighter Terry Bogard faces German warrior Wolfgang Krauser, only to suffer a humiliating defeat. Depressed by his loss, Terry wanders around the country, wasting his life through drinking. Only a young boy named Tony can convince Terry to go back to his winning ways, conquer his fears, and once again face Krauser.  (Source: ANN)  Based on the Neo Geo SNK video game Fatal Fury 2.
animeRelated: ['Fatal Fury: The Motion Picture', 'King of Fighters: Another Day', 'The King of Fighters: Destiny', 'Fatal Fury: Legend of the Hungry Wolf']
animeCharacters: ['Bogard, Terry', 'Shiranui, Mai', 'Bogard, Andy', 'Higashi, Joe', 'Krauser, Wolfgang', 'Howard, Geese', 'McGuire, Lily', 'Kim, Kaphwan', 'Tung, Fu Rue']
